name: DRAKO
description:
Video game created by Pedro Miguel Jato Ochoa (15 years old)

Created with the only knowledge obtained through the Internet, with this, my first video game shows that games can be made without having to go to a specialized school in this topic first. I hope you like the same thing that I liked to do it.

Find the six lives of Drako to save Valkyrie Island from the attack of the Inferos
